CustomField.description: Use this option to change the border color of choice based questions. Use hex or RGB color code as a value.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Answer Text Border Color allows you to customize the border color of choice-based questions in the survey responder interface. You can use either a hex color code (e.g., #RRGGBB) or an RGB color code (e.g., rgb(R, G, B)) as the value.
CustomField.label: Answer Text Border Color
